verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to thee that spoilest <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and thou wast not spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; and dealest treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and they dealt not treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee! when thou shalt cease <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to spoil <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, thou shalt be spoiled <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8714><s%>; and when thou shalt make an end <S%H5239><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to deal treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, they shall deal treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee.

O YY <S%H3068><s%>, be gracious <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto us; we have waited <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for thee: be thou their arm <S%H2220><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>, our salvation <S%H3444><s%> also in the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

At the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the tumult <S%H1995><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; at the lifting up <S%H7427><s%> of thyself the nations <S%H1471><s%> were scattered <S%H5310><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And your spoil <S%H7998><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8795><s%> like the gathering <S%H625><s%> of the caterpiller <S%H2625><s%>: as the running to and fro <S%H4944><s%> of locusts <S%H1357><s%> shall he run <S%H8264><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon them.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> is exalted <S%H7682><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; for he dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>: he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8765><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> with judgment <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

And wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall be the stability <S%H530><s%> of thy times <S%H6256><s%>, and strength <S%H2633><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>: the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is his treasure <S%H214><s%>.

Behold, their valiant ones <S%H691><s%> shall cry <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8804><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>: the ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> shall weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bitterly <S%H4751><s%>.

The highways <S%H4546><s%> lie waste <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, the wayfaring man <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H734><s%> ceaseht <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: he hath broken <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, he hath despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%>, he regardeth <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no man <S%H582><s%>.

The earth <S%H776><s%> mourneth <S%H56><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and languisheth <S%H535><s%> <S%H8797><s%>: Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> is ashamed <S%H2659><s%> <S%H8689><s%> and hewn down <S%H7060><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: Sharon <S%H8289><s%> is like a wilderness <S%H6160><s%>; and Bashan <S%H1316><s%> and Karmel <S%H3760><s%> shake off <S%H5287><s%> <S%H8802><s%> their fruits.

Now will I rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; now will I be exalted <S%H7426><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; now will I lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8735><s%> myself.

Ye shall conceive <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%> chaff <S%H2842><s%>, ye shall bring forth <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%>: your breath <S%H7307><s%>, as fire <S%H784><s%>, shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be as the burnings <S%H4955><s%> of lime <S%H7875><s%>: as tshofars <S%H6975><s%> cut up <S%H3683><s%> <S%H8803><s%> shall they be burned <S%H3341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye that are far off <S%H7350><s%>, what I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and, ye that are near <S%H7138><s%>, acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my might <S%H1369><s%>.

The sinners <S%H2400><s%> in TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> are afraid <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; fearfulness <S%H7461><s%> hath surprised <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the hypocrites <S%H2611><s%>. Who among us shall dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the devouring <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>? who among us shall dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with everlasting <S%H5769><s%> burnings <S%H4168><s%> ?

He that walketh <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> righteously <S%H6666><s%>, and speaketh <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> uprightly <S%H4339><s%>; he that despiseht <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the gain <S%H1215><s%> of oppressions <S%H4642><s%>, that shaketh <S%H5287><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> from holding <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of bribes <S%H7810><s%>, that stoppeth <S%H331><s%> <S%H8801><s%> his ears <S%H241><s%> from hearing <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and shutteth <S%H6105><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> from seeing <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>;

He shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>: his place of defence <S%H4869><s%> shall be the munitions <S%H4679><s%> of rocks <S%H5553><s%>: bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8737><s%> him; his waters <S%H4325><s%> shall be sure <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H2372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in his beauty <S%H3308><s%>: they shall behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that is very far off <S%H4801><s%>.

Thine heart <S%H3820><s%> shall meditate <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> terror <S%H367><s%>. Where is the scribe <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? where is the receiver <S%H8254><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? where is he that counted <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the towers <S%H4026><s%> ?

Thou shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a fierce <S%H3267><s%> <S%H8737><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, a people <S%H5971><s%> of a deeper <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> than thou canst perceive <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; of a stammering <S%H3932><s%> <S%H8737><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>, that thou canst not understand <S%H998><s%>.

Look <S%H2372><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, the city <S%H7151><s%> of our solemnities <S%H4150><s%>: thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> a quiet <S%H7600><s%> habitation <S%H5116><s%>, a tabernacle <S%H168><s%> that shall not be taken down <S%H6813><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; not one of the stakes <S%H3489><s%> thereof shall ever <S%H5331><s%> be removed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither shall any of the cords <S%H2256><s%> thereof be broken <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

But there the glorious <S%H117><s%> YY <S%H3068><s%> will be unto us a place <S%H4725><s%> of broad <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> and streams <S%H2975><s%>; wherein shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no <S%H1077><s%> galley <S%H590><s%> with oars <S%H7885><s%>, neither shall gallant <S%H117><s%> ship <S%H6716><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereby.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> is our judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> is our Torahgiver <S%H2710><s%> <S%H8781><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> is our king <S%H4428><s%>; he will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us.

Thy tacklings <S%H2256><s%> are loosed <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; they could not well <S%H3653><s%> strengthen <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their mast <S%H8650><s%>, they could not spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sail <S%H5251><s%>: then is the prey <S%H5706><s%> of a great <S%H4766><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8795><s%>; the lame <S%H6455><s%> take <S%H962><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the prey <S%H957><s%>.

And the inhabitant <S%H7934><s%> shall not say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: the people <S%H5971><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> therein shall be forgiven <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8803><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
